name: Desktop Colony
description:
Welcome to the Pre-Alpha release! About the game:

Desktop Colony is a colony sim / survival game, where you manage the colonist in order to survive. You will be able to give the colonist task, such as to mine ore, cut trees, hunt animals, craft items, etc... Each map is randomly generated, will you be able to survive?

Whats in this build:

currently this is just a demo build to show off the map generation, and the AI. You can tell the AI to move places by clicking with left mouse, and it'll head in that direction until it reaches it.
